title: Not just a title race: Norris & Piastri's fight to make McLaren 'their' F1 team
summary: The battle between McLaren's two F1 drivers is on a knife edge and the stakes are sky-high: whoever wins is set to claim the 2025 championship, but could also shape the team's future

qa_pairs.question: Which two drivers are currently competing within McLaren for dominance in the team?
What significant impact could the outcome of the internal competition between Norris and Piastri have?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It could shape the team's future.
wrong_options: It will determine the next engine supplier.
It will decide the next team principal.
It will influence driver line-up for other teams.

qa_pairs.question: In what year is the championship title being contested between the two McLaren drivers?
